title: Aquaponics Sensor Data
description: Schema for aquaponics sensor time series data

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp in ISO 8601 format with Z suffix

ph.description: pH value (0-14 scale), null if sensor unavailable

tds.description: Total Dissolved Solids in ppm, null if sensor unavailable

temp_c.description: Water temperature in Celsius, null if sensor unavailable
